summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 14, 2020, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's hearing. An FBI agent requests information on the hearing's outcome and notes that 'EM' (likely Epstein or Epstein-related) wants an 'SCN' (possibly a Secure Communication Notification or similar) after the hearing.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email is about a hearing involving Ghislaine Maxwell, requesting an update on its outcome.

connections.description: EM (likely Epstein) is shown to have an interest in the legal proceedings against Maxwell, requesting a notification after her hearing.

events.title: Maxwell's Hearing
events.description: A hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled to take place. The email requests an update on its outcome and any pertinent information.

keyFacts: An FBI agent requested an update on the outcome of Ghislaine Maxwell's hearing on July 14, 2020.
A person referred to as 'EM' (strongly indicative of Jeffrey Epstein, though he died in 2019) wanted an 'SCN' (likely Secure Communication Notification) after the hearing.
The email suggests ongoing coordination or interest in Maxwell's legal proceedings from parties associated with Epstein.
